pages.text: $(d)Platforms$() are $(3)solid on top but not from the bottom or sides$().$(br2)Additionally, sneaking will allow you to fall through them.
pages.title: Platforms

pages.text: The $(d)Super Lubricant Platform$() acts the same way but fully negates friction, just like the other $(l:blocks/super_lubricant_stone)Super Lubricated blocks$(/l).$(br2)This makes it very useful for transporting items, especially when used with $(l:blocks/plates)Plates$(/l).
pages.title: Super Lubricant Platform

pages.text: The $(d)Filtered Super Lubricant Platform$() works the same way, but can accept an $(l:items/item_filter)Item Filter$(/l).$(br2)Any items matching the Filter will fall through the Platform.
pages.title: Filtered Super Lubricant Platform
